title: Bullard-Havens, Bassick get football wins
text:
Bullard-Havens, Bassick get football wins Published 11:35 pm, Saturday, October 24, 2015 
BRIDGEPORT — Tyrese Wright rushed for three touchdowns and Khalil Content rushed for two more to lead Bullard-Havens over Cheney Tech, 34-20, in a CSC football matchup Saturday afternoon. 
Wright rushed for 147 yards on 18 carries, including scoring runs of 22, 2 and 15 yards, and Content added 141 yards on the ground on 15 carries, scoring on rushes of 4 and 6 yards. 
Both Wright and Content scored twice in the first half, as the Tigers (5-1) took a 26-6 halftime lead. 
Defensively for Bullard-Havens, Anthony Negron had nine tackles and two sacks and Daiwon Nelson added eight tackles and one sack. 
Rafael Lebron passed for one touchdown and caught a touchdown pass for a second score to lead the Beavers (4-2). 
Bullard-Havens 34, Cheney Tech 
CHENEY TECH 0 6 8 6—20 
BULLARD-HAVENS 12 14 8 0—34 
BH—Khalil Content 4 run (kick failed) 
BH—Tyrese Wright 22 run (conversion failed) 
CT— Shane Hutchinson 25 interception return (kick failed) 
BH—Wright 2 run (Wright run) 
BH—Content 6 run (run failed) 
CT—Kaivon Banks 12 pass Rafael Lebron (Banks run) 
BH—Wright 15 run (Content run) 
CT—Lebron 30 pass Ramon Garcia (conversion failed) 
Records: Cheney Tech 4-2, Bullard-Havens 5-1. 
BASSICK 34, CREC 6 
ENFIELD — Mykell Stinston rushed for 258 yards and three touchdowns as the Lions (1-4) picked up their first win of the season. 
Darall Francis added 143 yards and one touchdown rushing to help power Bassick’s offense and Bronson Beckwith had eight solo tackles and scored one touchdown and Kevin Monnelus added 11 tackles. 
BOYS SOCCER
